select u.WebAccount_Ls,u.WebAccount_Code,u.WebAccount_Name,u.WebAccount_Text, u.Area_ls,a.Area_Name,u.UserInfo_Ls,t.UserInfo_Name, u.WebAccount_Login,u.WebAccount_Password,u.WebAccount_Image, u.create_user,u.create_time,u.update_user,u.update_time,u.status from queue_WebAccount u left join queue_area a on u.Area_Ls = a.Area_Ls left join queue_userinfo t on u.UserInfo_Ls=t.UserInfo_Ls where u.Status='1'
and u.WebAccount_Name like "%${webaccount.webaccountName}%"
and u.Area_Ls="${webaccount.areaLs}"
